Text: ...Hyah!
How was that?

So the enemy has achieved a formidable defense
through manipulating magic...

I've asked Eta to recreate their methods using the
golem as test dummies.

A piercing magic attack focused on a single point is
essential for breaking this skillful defense head-on.

I'm glad you made it back safely along with this
intel. Not only that, but you've also provided us
with an effective countermeasure.
Well done, Beta.

N-Not at all! I'm not even sure this makes up for the
lack of any other intel...

There's no evidence pointing toward the identity of
the mysterious paladin.

I've tried looking into MNA's top-secret documents
and various other resources, but I haven't been
able to obtain any decisive intel.

All we know is he's somehow connected to the knights
of the Church, and...he wore a strange mask that hid
his face.

It's unclear whether it's a secret offshoot within
the Cult of Diablos...or a separate organization
altogether.

Have you tried gathering intel from the Knight Order
within the Church?

Yes, but no organization exists within the Knight
Order that uses such assassination techniques.

A common scenario in stories is that their Knight
Orders have a dark side to them—a faction that 
carries out their dirty work.

In reality, such factions don't exist, or perhaps
they've kept themselves cleverly hidden.
Lady Alpha, you don't mean—
Heheh. It's not that far-fetched.

Your opponent wore the clothes of a paladin and was
skilled in the art of combat—that's enough to prove
some connection to the Church.

He may belong to an organization within the Church
that is kept strictly secret, or perhaps an outside
entity that seeks to bring down the Church.

Wait...do you think the Cult of Diablos and the
Church are at odds, then?

There's no proof, of course. It's all just a theory
for now.

But...we can leap into the chaos and confirm it for
ourselves.
You mean return to the hideout in Lindwurm?
Yes. I'm thinking we poke the sleeping bear.

Whether they are allies or enemies of the Cult, we
can acquire intel by provoking them into action.

And to do that, I'll need to learn the necessary
fighting tactics for this operation from you, Beta.

Lady Alpha... Very well! I'll do my best to teach you
what I know!

If I can disrupt my opponent's mental defenses, I can
also focus on a "point" that disrupts their magic
defenses.

It would be difficult with a bow and arrow, but it
can be done with the maneuverability of a sword!

Incredible! What a precise pinpoint attack,
Lady Alpha!

I have a good teacher. Your experience paving your
own path forward and escaping the jaws of death
seems to have paid off.

I've only taken advantage of your invaluable
experience. Any skills or strength I've gained
are all thanks to you, Beta.
...Hmm, real protagonist talk...
Is something the matter?

Oh, um, it's nothing! For our next training, we'll
simulate a setting where you're taking on multiple
opponents!
Okay, got it.

I don't know who this paladin is...but we're going to
find out!
